sn21:1.1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn21:1.1.3_0: Tatra kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn21:1.1.5_0: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa paccassosuṁ.
sn21:1.2.2_1: rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
sn21:1.2.6_0: ‘idha bhikkhu vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ cetaso ekodibhāvaṁ avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
sn21:1.2.8_1: vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ cetaso ekodibhāvaṁ avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja vihariṁ.
sn21:1.2.9_1: iminā vihārena viharato vitakkasahagatā saññā manasikārā samudācaranti.
sn21:1.3.2_0: ‘moggallāna moggallāna, mā, brāhmaṇa, ariyaṁ tuṇhībhāvaṁ pamādo,
sn21:1.3.3_1: aparena samayena vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ cetaso ekodibhāvaṁ avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharāmi.
sn21:1.3.4_0: Yañhi taṁ, āvuso, sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
sn21:2.1.2_0: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn21:2.1.4_0: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṁ.
sn21:2.2.1_1: rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
sn21:2.2.2_0: ‘atthi nu kho taṁ kiñci lokasmiṁ yassa me vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjeyyuṁ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā’ti?
sn21:2.2.4_0: ‘natthi kho taṁ kiñci lokasmiṁ yassa me vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjeyyuṁ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā’”ti.
sn21:2.3.3_1: vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā nuppajjeyyuṁ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā, api ca me evamassa:
sn21:2.3.4_0: ‘mahesakkho vata bho satthā antarahito mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo.
sn21:2.3.5_0: Sace hi bhagavā ciraṁ dīghamaddhānaṁ tiṭṭheyya tadassa bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānan’ti.
sn21:2.3.6_0: Tathā hi panāyasmato sāriputtassa dīgharattaṁ ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā susamūhatā.
sn21:2.3.7_0: Tasmā āyasmato sāriputtassa satthupi vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā nuppajjeyyuṁ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti.
sn21:3.1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn21:3.1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahāmoggallāno rājagahe viharanti veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe ekavihāre.
sn21:3.1.4_0: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkami;
sn21:3.1.5_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
sn21:3.1.5_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ etadavoca:
sn21:3.2.2_0: parisuddho mukhavaṇṇo pariyodāto santena nūnāyasmā mahāmoggallāno ajja vihārena vihāsī”ti.
sn21:3.2.4_0: Api ca me ahosi dhammī kathā”ti.
sn21:3.2.5_0: “Kena saddhiṁ panāyasmato mahāmoggallānassa ahosi dhammī kathā”ti?
sn21:3.2.7_1: bhagavā etarahi sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn21:3.2.8_0: Kiṁ nu kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhagavantaṁ iddhiyā upasaṅkami;
sn21:3.2.9_0: udāhu bhagavā āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ iddhiyā upasaṅkamī”ti?
sn21:3.2.12_0: Api ca me yāvatā bhagavā ettāvatā dibbacakkhu visujjhi dibbā ca sotadhātu.
sn21:3.2.13_0: Bhagavatopi yāvatāhaṁ ettāvatā dibbacakkhu visujjhi dibbā ca sotadhātū”ti.
sn21:3.2.14_0: “Yathākathaṁ panāyasmato mahāmoggallānassa bhagavatā saddhiṁ ahosi dhammī kathā”ti?
sn21:3.3.3_0: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, āraddhavīriyo hotī’ti?
sn21:3.3.4_0: Evaṁ vutte, maṁ, āvuso, bhagavā etadavoca:
sn21:3.3.6_0: kāmaṁ taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatu,
sn21:3.3.6_2: yaṁ taṁ purisathāmena purisavīriyena purisaparakkamena pattabbaṁ na taṁ apāpuṇitvā vīriyassa saṇṭhānaṁ bhavissatīti.
sn21:3.4.1_1: himavato pabbatarājassa parittā pāsāṇasakkharā yāvadeva upanikkhepanamattāya;
sn21:3.4.2_0: evameva kho mayaṁ āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa yāvadeva upanikkhepanamattāya.
sn21:3.4.3_0: Āyasmā hi mahāmoggallāno mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo ākaṅkhamāno kappaṁ tiṭṭheyyā”ti.
sn21:3.5.1_1: mahatiyā loṇaghaṭāya parittā loṇasakkharāya yāvadeva upanikkhepanamattāya;
sn21:3.5.2_0: evameva kho mayaṁ āyasmato sāriputtassa yāvadeva upanikkhepanamattāya.
sn21:3.5.3_0: Āyasmā hi sāriputto bhagavatā anekapariyāyena thomito vaṇṇito pasattho:
sn21:3.7.1_0: Itiha te ubho mahānāgā aññamaññassa subhāsitaṁ sulapitaṁ samanumodiṁsūti.
sn21:4.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro navo bhikkhu pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto vihāraṁ pavisitvā appossukko tuṇhībhūto saṅkasāyati,
sn21:4.1.3_0: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
sn21:4.1.3_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn21:4.1.4_1: aññataro navo bhikkhu pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto vihāraṁ pavisitvā appossukko tuṇhībhūto saṅkasāyati,
sn21:4.2.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ āmantesi:
sn21:4.2.2_1: mama vacanena taṁ bhikkhuṁ āmantehi ‘satthā taṁ, āvuso, āmantetī’”ti.
sn21:4.2.3_1: bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato paṭissutvā yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami;
sn21:4.2.5_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho so bhikkhu tassa bhikkhuno paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn21:4.2.5_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho taṁ bhikkhuṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn21:4.2.6_1: pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto vihāraṁ pavisitvā appossukko tuṇhībhūto saṅkasāyasi,
sn21:4.3.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā tassa bhikkhuno cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn21:4.3.2_0: “mā kho tumhe, bhikkhave, etassa bhikkhuno ujjhāyittha.
sn21:4.3.3_1: bhikkhu catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī,
sn21:4.3.3_2: yassa catthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti,
sn21:4.3.3_3: tadanuttaraṁ brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī”ti.
sn21:4.4.2_0: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:
sn21:5.1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā sujāto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
sn21:5.1.3_0: Addasā kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ sujātaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ.
sn21:5.1.6_0: yañca abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgato,
sn21:5.1.6_1: yassa catthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti tadanuttaraṁ brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī”ti.
sn21:6.1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā lakuṇḍakabhaddiyo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
sn21:6.1.3_0: Addasā kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ lakuṇḍakabhaddiyaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ.
sn21:6.1.5_1: etaṁ bhikkhuṁ āgacchantaṁ dubbaṇṇaṁ duddasikaṁ okoṭimakaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ paribhūtarūpan”ti?
sn21:6.1.7_2: na ca sā samāpatti sulabharūpā yā tena bhikkhunā asamāpannapubbā.
sn21:6.1.8_0: Yassa catthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti,
sn21:6.1.8_1: tadanuttaraṁ brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī”ti.
sn21:7.1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
sn21:7.1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā visākho pañcālaputto upaṭṭhānasālāyaṁ bhikkhū dhammiyā kathāya sandasseti samādapeti samuttejeti sampahaṁseti,
sn21:7.1.3_1: poriyā vācāya vissaṭṭhāya anelagalāya atthassa viññāpaniyā pariyāpannāya anissitāya.
sn21:7.2.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena upaṭṭhānasālā tenupasaṅkami;
sn21:7.2.3_1: upaṭṭhānasālāyaṁ bhikkhū dhammiyā kathāya sandasseti samādapeti samuttejeti sampahaṁseti poriyā vācāya vissaṭṭhāya anelagalāya atthassa viññāpaniyā pariyāpannāya anissitāyā”ti?
sn21:7.2.4_1: visākho pañcālaputto upaṭṭhānasālāyaṁ bhikkhū dhammiyā kathāya sandasseti samādapeti samuttejeti sampahaṁseti,
sn21:7.2.4_2: poriyā vācāya vissaṭṭhāya anelagalāya atthassa viññāpaniyā pariyāpannāya anissitāyā”ti.
sn21:7.3.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ visākhaṁ pañcālaputtaṁ āmantesi:
sn21:7.3.3_1: bhikkhū dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi …pe… atthassa viññāpaniyā pariyāpannāya anissitāyā”ti.
sn21:7.4.2_0: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:
sn21:8.1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā nando bhagavato mātucchāputto ākoṭitapaccākoṭitāni cīvarāni pārupitvā akkhīni añjetvā acchaṁ pattaṁ gahetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn21:8.1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ nandaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn21:8.1.3_1: patirūpaṁ kulaputtassa saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitassa,
sn21:8.1.3_2: yaṁ tvaṁ ākoṭitapaccākoṭitāni cīvarāni pārupeyyāsi, akkhīni ca añjeyyāsi, acchañca pattaṁ dhāreyyāsi.
sn21:8.1.4_1: patirūpaṁ kulaputtassa saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitassa, yaṁ tvaṁ āraññiko ca assasi,
sn21:8.1.4_2: piṇḍapātiko ca paṁsukūliko ca kāmesu ca anapekkho vihareyyāsī”ti.
sn21:8.3.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā nando aparena samayena āraññiko ca piṇḍapātiko ca paṁsukūliko ca kāmesu ca anapekkho vihāsīti.
sn21:9.1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā tisso bhagavato pitucchāputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn21:9.1.2_1: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi dukkhī dummano assūni pavattayamāno.
sn21:9.1.2_2: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ tissaṁ etadavoca:
sn21:9.1.3_1: ekamantaṁ nisinno dukkhī dummano assūni pavattayamāno”ti?
sn21:9.1.5_0: “Tathāhi pana tvaṁ, tissa, vattā no ca vacanakkhamo;
sn21:9.1.6_1: patirūpaṁ kulaputtassa saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitassa,
sn21:9.1.6_2: yaṁ tvaṁ vattā no ca vacanakkhamo.
sn21:9.1.7_1: patirūpaṁ kulaputtassa saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitassa:
sn21:9.1.8_0: ‘yaṁ tvaṁ vattā ca assa vacanakkhamo cā’”ti.
sn21:9.2.2_0: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:
sn21:10.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn21:10.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu theranāmako ekavihārī ceva hoti ekavihārassa ca vaṇṇavādī.
sn21:10.1.3_0: So eko gāmaṁ piṇḍāya pavisati eko paṭikkamati eko raho nisīdati eko caṅkamaṁ adhiṭṭhāti.
sn21:10.1.4_0: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
sn21:10.1.4_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn21:10.1.5_1: aññataro bhikkhu theranāmako ekavihārī ekavihārassa ca vaṇṇavādī”ti.
sn21:10.2.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ āmantesi:
sn21:10.2.4_1: bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato paṭissutvā yenāyasmā thero tenupasaṅkami;
sn21:10.2.6_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā thero tassa bhikkhuno paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn21:10.2.6_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ theraṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn21:10.2.10_1: eko gāmaṁ piṇḍāya pavisāmi eko paṭikkamāmi eko raho nisīdāmi eko caṅkamaṁ adhiṭṭhāmi.
sn21:10.3.3_0: taṁ suṇāhi, sādhukaṁ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
sn21:10.3.6_0: Idha, thera, yaṁ atītaṁ taṁ pahīnaṁ,
sn21:10.4.2_0: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:
sn21:11.1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahākappino yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
sn21:11.1.3_0: Addasā kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ mahākappinaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ.
sn21:11.1.5_1: etaṁ bhikkhuṁ āgacchantaṁ odātakaṁ tanukaṁ tuṅganāsikan”ti?
sn21:11.1.8_0: Na ca sā samāpatti sulabharūpā yā tena bhikkhunā asamāpannapubbā.
sn21:11.1.9_0: Yassa catthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti tadanuttaraṁ brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī”ti.
sn21:11.2.2_0: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:
sn21:12.1.2_0: Atha kho dve bhikkhū sahāyakā āyasmato mahākappinassa saddhivihārino yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu.
sn21:12.1.3_0: Addasā kho bhagavā te bhikkhū dūratova āgacchante.
sn21:12.1.5_1: ete bhikkhū sahāyake āgacchante kappinassa saddhivihārino”ti?
sn21:12.1.9_0: Yassa catthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti tadanuttaraṁ brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharantī”ti.
sn21:12.2.2_0: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:
